description.raw:
This script automates the API/ABI checker steps described in the [wiki](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Abi_checker).  Usage is simple:

    cd gazebo
    ./tools/api_checker.bash .

Notes:

* It takes a bit of time to run, due in part to the separate build of Gazebo (hopefully accelerated by ccache) and in part to the time required by the api/abi checker itself.
* It assumes that you want to check compatibility with the currently released version of Gazebo.
* It assumes that your working copy and the system install agree in major.minor (for the purposes of finding headers).

The last two limitations could be removed with the addition of some logic and a couple of command-line arguments.

If this script is useful, we should consider:

* merging it forward to gazebo_2.0 and default;
* adding a similar script to sdformat; and
* generalizing it for use on other packages (might be complicated by details of header locations and knowledge of which headers to skip).
